docs.lead_paragraph: Merck is selling its Merial stake to clear a path for its merger with Schering-Plough, but it could create an even bigger joint venture with Sanofi after that deal wins approval.

headline.seo: Merck Selling Stake in Animal Health Venture to Sanofi for $4 Billion
headline.main: Merck Selling Stake in Animal Venture
headline.print_headline: Merck Selling Stake in Animal Venture

docs.snippet: Merck is selling its Merial stake to clear a path for its merger with Schering-Plough, but it could create an even bigger joint venture with Sanofi after that deal wins approval.

docs.lead_paragraph: Consumers were told not to use body-building products that are sold as supplements but may contain steroids.

headline.seo: F.D.A. Issues Steroid Warning on Body-Building Supplements
headline.main: Supplements for Athletes Draw Alert From F.D.A.
headline.print_headline: Supplements For Athletes Draw Alert From F.D.A.

docs.snippet: Consumers were told not to use body-building products that are sold as supplements but may contain steroids.

byline.original: By NATASHA SINGER and MICHAEL S. SCHMIDT
